languages.text: "Неужто в изодранном гобелене судеб народа Крудараха ты зришь хоть какое-то правосудие, элантах? Твоя предшественница уничтожила его, распустила по нитям, спалила дотла... И рассеяла по ветру тысячи душ!" {n}Голос эльдарки полнится печалью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Неужто в изодранном гобелене судеб народа Крудараха ты зришь хоть какое-то провосудие, элантах? Твоя предшественница уничтожила его, распустила по нитям, спалила дотла... И рассеяла по ветру тысячи душ!" {n}Голос эльдарки полнится печалью.{/n}

languages.text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Неужто в изодранном гобелене судеб народа Крудараха ты зришь хоть какое-то правосудие, элантах? Твоя предшественница уничтожила его, распустила по нитям, спалила дотла... И рассеяла по ветру тысячи душ!" {n}Голос эльдарки полнится печалью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of the Crudarach destinies, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari woman's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

"Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of the Crudarach destinies, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari woman's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

"Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari woman's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

"Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

"Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari woman's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

languages.text: « Pensez-vous réellement que le sort réservé à la planète Crudarach par les sursauts erratiques du destin soit juste, elantach ? Votre prédécesseure l'a saccagé, l'a transformé en un amas de cendre, l'a anéanti... et a laissé des milliers d'âmes se faire emporter par le vent ! » {n}La voix de l'Aeldari est chargée de tristesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pensez-vous réellement que le sort réservé à la planète Crudarach par les sursauts erratiques du destin soit juste, elantach ? Votre prédécesseure l'a saccagé, l'a transformé en un amas de cendre, l'a anéanti... et a laissé des milliers d'âmes se faire emporter par le vent ! » {n}La voix de l'Aeldari est chargée de tristesse.{/n}

languages.text: “你真的认为，克鲁达拉赫遭受的苦难命运有丝毫正义可言吗，外界人？在你之前的那些人，他们摧毁了它，把它化为碎片、烧成灰烬……成千上万的灵魂就此随风飘散！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你真的认为，克鲁达拉赫遭受的苦难命运有丝毫正义可言吗，外界人？在你之前的那些人，他们摧毁了它，把它化为碎片、烧成灰烬……成千上万的灵魂就此随风飘散！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}
“你真的认为，克鲁达拉赫遭受的苦难命运有丝毫正义可言吗，外界人？在你之前的那些人，他们摧毁了它，把它化为碎片、烧成灰烬……成千上万的灵魂就此随风飘散！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}

languages.text: "Seht Ihr tatsächlich Gerechtigkeit in dem zerschlissenen Wandteppich des Schicksals, das den Kindern von Crudarach angeboten wird, Elantach? Eure Vorgängerin hat ihn zerstört, hat ihn aufgetrennt, hat ihn niedergebrannt ... Und hat tausende von Seelen im Wind zerstreut!" {n}In der Stimme der Aeldari liegt tiefe Trauer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seht Ihr tatsächlich Gerechtigkeit in dem zerschlissenen Wandteppich des Schicksals, das den Kindern von Crudarach angeboten wird, Elantach? Eure Vorgängerin hat ihn zerstört, hat ihn aufgetrennt, hat ihn niedergebrannt ... Und hat tausende von Seelen im Wind zerstreut!" {n}In der Stimme der Aeldari liegt tiefe Trauer.{/n}

"Seht Ihr tatsächlich Gerechtigkeit in dem zerschlissenen Wandteppich des Schicksals, das den Kindern von Crudarach angeboten wird, Elantach? Eure Vorgängerin hat ihn zerstört, hat ihn aufgetrennt, hat ihn niedergebrannt ... Und hat tausende von Seelen im Wind zerstreut!" {n}In der Stimme der Aeldari liegt tiefe Trauer.{/n}

languages.text: «¿De verdad ves justicia en el aciago destino al que se enfrentó Crudarach, elantach? Tu predecesora lo destruyó, lo quebrantó y lo quemó por completo... ¡Hizo volar por los aires a miles de almas!». {n}La voz de la Aeldari está llena de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad ves justicia en el aciago destino al que se enfrentó Crudarach, elantach? Tu predecesora lo destruyó, lo quebrantó y lo quemó por completo... ¡Hizo volar por los aires a miles de almas!». {n}La voz de la Aeldari está llena de dolor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたはクルダラに差し伸べられた厳しい宿命を正義だと思いますか、エランタ？あなたの前任者はそれを破壊し、バラバラにし、焼き尽くして地に落とし…何千もの魂を風に散らしました！」{n}アエルダリの声は悲しみで響いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはクルダラに差し伸べられた厳しい宿命を正義だと思いますか、エランタ？あなたの前任者はそれを破壊し、バラバラにし、焼き尽くして地に落とし…何千もの魂を風に散らしました！」{n}アエルダリの声は悲しみで響いた。{/n}

languages.text: "Crudarachlılara düşen bu kaderi sahiden adil buluyor musun elantach? Selefin bu kaderi de yok etti, yakıp yıktı... Binlerce ruhu havaya saçtı!" {n}Aeldari'nin sesi, kasvetle yankılanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you really see justice in the frayed tapestry of fate offered to those of Crudarach, elantach? Your predecessor destroyed it, unravelled it, burned it to the ground... And scattered thousands of souls into the wind!" {n}The Aeldari's voice is ringing with sorrow.{/n}
